package.name: dadjoke
package.author: Yordan Ivanov
package.description: A random dad joke every time
package.title: Dadjoke

manifest.author: Yordan Ivanov
manifest.description: A random dad joke every time
manifest.name: dadjoke
manifest.title: Dadjoke

packageRepo.readme:
# Espanso Dadjoke

A simple package that expands to a random dad joke every time.

Powered by [icanhazdadjoke](https://icanhazdadjoke.com/).

## Installation

Make sure you have already installed [Espanso](https://espanso.org/install/) first.

```sh
espanso install dadjoke
```

Now you can open Slack and type `:dadjoke`

## Notes

* Requires `curl`
* Not tested on Windows

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
matches:
  - trigger: ":dadjoke"
    replace: "{{output}}"
    vars:
      - name: output
        type: shell
        params:
          cmd: "curl -H 'Accept: text/plain' https://icanhazdadjoke.com/"
